channel.title: psychology on gingerBill
channel.description: Recent content in psychology on gingerBill

item.title: The Essence of Programming
item.description: One thing I have noticed a lot when a programmer is struggling to solve a problem, especially a novice, is that he is stuck worrying about the “best way” to implement the solution rather than actually understanding the problem he has. I believe a lot of this stems from not understanding the essence of what programming fundamentally is. Essentially Ordered Aspects In a previous article of mine, I state that “Programming is a tool to solve problems that you have in the domain of computers”.

item.title: The Fatal Flaw of Ownership Semantics
item.description: I have been toying with a theoretical idea for the past 18 months off-and-on in my head and I have not fully articulated it aloud yet. It is regarding the concept of Ownership Semantics (OS) or Move Semantics in programming languages. Fundamentally this article is a criticism of the concept and states that the concept is a duality of traditional OOP but applied to a different area. General Definitions of Terminology A general list of definitions of terminology used within this article in order to minimize confusion.
